news.title: On holiday with friends, ex-Jharkhand CM Champai Soren’s grandson dies in Manali
news.description: Police say Champai Soren, who has reached Manali, has requested that no postmortem be conducted on his grandson Veer Soren.
news.content:
Veer Soren, grandson of former Jharkhand chief minister Champai Soren, was found dead at a homestay in Manali, Himachal Pradesh, on Tuesday, the police said on Wednesday.
